summary: VEHICLE BOUGHT NEW IN 2008.  IN THE LAST COUPLE OF YEARS, HAD TO:    REPLACE BOTH BRAKE CALIPERS DUE TO DRAGGING AND OVERHEATING.    REPLACE LF WHEEL BEARING HUB ASSEMBLY - MAKING NOISE - FOUND TO HAVE WORN BEARING,    WIPER MOTOR REPLACED FOR RECALL, NEVER HAD ISSUE. NOW IT DOES NOT WORK CORRECTLY, IMPROPER CYCLING SPEEDS, WON'T TURN ON, OR WON'T TURN OFF AT TIMES. MILEAGE ~ 38,000. THIS IS DANGEROUS, JUST LIKE THE BRAKES AND BEARING.  *TR
